products.title: Voile FR Sage Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Sage Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Flame Retardant Voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This mint green electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Our electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Our Voile Sage Green electric roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2060 Fabric Colour: Sage Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Pear Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Pear Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This Pear Green electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  The bright pear green of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2065 Fabric Colour: Pear Green Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Lime Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Lime Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout lime green fabric is a fabulous fresh green tone, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors, this shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades. 
 
Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style. 
 
This child-safe, electric roller blind can be upgrade for use with smart phones, Amazon Alexa and Google Home Hub devices.  At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this Electric Roller Blind made by our expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year gurarantee!

products.title: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash vine green electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The lush green roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green double-sided electric roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer.  With a textured leafy design, it’s ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room.  The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
